meanings.definition: A pile of waste material or debris.
meanings.sent1: The old factory had several dustheaps behind it.
meanings.sent2: The wind scattered the dustheaps across the field.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek around the dusty dustheaps.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house was surrounded by towering dustheaps of forgotten memories.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the dustheaps was unbearable.

meanings.sent4: The company decided to dustheaps all the outdated equipment.
meanings.sent5: The careless hiker would dustheaps his food wrappers along the trail.
